description: Comprehensive authentication system including OTP registration/sign-in, profile management, avatar upload, Passkey authentication, SMS OTP, social media OAuth (Google/Apple/Facebook/Microsoft), unified authentication UI, account linking, analytics, and error handling.
Enable users to find venues through text-based search by name or location, location-based 'Near Me' feature using GPS, and display comprehensive venue information in search results.
Manage venue selection lifecycle including explicit venue selection, visual confirmation of selected venue, switching venues, and handling cart items during venue changes.
Comprehensive product browsing system with category-based navigation, featured products section, product detail views with alcohol content, allergy information, and pricing.
Advanced product discovery through text-based search, category/tag filtering, multiple filter combinations, sort options (price, popularity, name), and search result relevance.

Ensure users meet legal drinking age requirements through age verification modal, DOB collection and validation, legal age checks, session persistence for verified users, and re-verification mechanisms.
Complete rewards system including points balance display, tier progression tracking, reward redemption, referral program management, points transaction history, and rewards analytics.
Full cart functionality including add/remove items, quantity adjustment, cart summary display, discount application, promotional codes, cart persistence, and empty cart handling.
Complete purchase flow including order review, delivery/pickup selection, payment information entry, promotional code application, order confirmation, and guest checkout support.
Comprehensive order tracking including past order viewing, detailed order information, order status tracking, quick reorder functionality, order filtering/sorting, and order cancellation.

User profile management including personal information editing, contact details management, birthday/gender updates, address management, preference center for notifications/marketing/privacy, and profile data validation.
Secure payment method management including add/remove payment methods, default payment selection, secure payment detail updates, payment history viewing, and PCI compliance.
Detailed order history with past order viewing, order detail access, real-time status tracking, reorder functionality, order search/filter, delivery/pickup tracking, and order cancellation.
User activity analytics including spending patterns visualization, order frequency analysis, rewards metrics, personalized insights, data export capabilities, and comparative analytics.
Enhanced security through biometric authentication management, Face ID/Touch ID setup, biometric preferences, fallback authentication, device management, and security audit logging.
Responsible drinking features including BAC estimation, drink tracking, biometric health monitoring, safety alerts, drinking session management, and intervention mechanisms.
Complete Stripe integration including payment method management, secure payment processing, PCI compliance, subscription billing support, refund handling, webhook management, and payment analytics.
Comprehensive privacy controls including GDPR/CCPA compliance, cookie consent management, data privacy controls (export/deletion), security audit logs, consent management, and privacy policy access.
Venue onboarding system including partnership landing page, benefits display, venue inquiry form, partnership program details, lead management, and partnership analytics.
Social ordering features including buddy list management, drink assignment to friends, group order creation, assignee acceptance workflow, sobriety monitor integration, and group payment splitting.
Real-time AI-powered safety advisor providing personalized recommendations, predictive BAC alerts, intervention strategies, emergency notifications, and effectiveness tracking.
Hands-free ordering through voice commands, natural language processing, order confirmation, voice search, accessibility features, and multi-language support.
Intelligent allergen management with profile-based allergen tracking, real-time product warnings, severity-based alerts, cross-contamination warnings, and alternative product suggestions.
AI-powered venue recommendations based on user preferences, occasion-based suggestions, social group matching, real-time availability, and personalized venue ranking.
Intelligent group order coordination with preference learning, conflict resolution, budget optimization, timing coordination, and dietary accommodation.
Automated spending insights with pattern recognition, budget tracking, category analysis, predictive spending, tax/expense reporting, and financial goal tracking.
